results.deck: Monte Cristo was a French computer game developer and publisher, based in Paris. It was established in 1995 by former Credit Suisse First Boston vice-president Jean-Marc de Fety and former Mars & Co strategy senior consultant Jean-Cristophe Marquis. The company was led by Jean-Christophe Marquis and JÃ©rome Gastaldi since 2002. Monte Cristo shut down in May 2010 following poor sales of Cities XL.
results.description: Monte Cristo Multimedia was a French video game developer. They closed following poor sales of Cities XL.
results.name: Monte Cristo Multimedia

concept.name: Letters Replaced by Numbers in Title
